revision.text:
[[File:SootheBell.png|thumb|200px|The Soothe Bell]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Soothe Bell costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] in [[Johto]], [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Verdanturf Town]] in [[Hoenn]], and [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Hearthome City]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Pichu || | Pikachu |- | Cleffa || | Clefairy |- | Igglybuff || | Jigglypuff |- | Togepi || | Togetic |- | Azurill || | Marill |- | Golbat || | Crobat |- | Budew || | Roselia |- | Buneary || | Lopunny |- | Riolu || | Lucario |- | Eevee || | Espeon (6am-6pm) |- | Eevee || | Umbreon (6pm-6am) |- | Chansey || | Blissey |- | Munchlax || | Snorlax |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
